Name: ComStar News Bureau
Details: In addition to its HPG services, ComStar runs one of the most important holovid interstellar news networks in the Inner Sphere. ComStar News Bureau is considered to be unbiased when compared to the media of the Successor States, which are considered to be full of propaganda and desinformation. In the last decades the CNB has been expanding its distribution and coverage of the Periphery, bringing it closer to the rest of human space.
